scripts.up: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run k8s:deploy
scripts.docker:build: sudo docker build --target prod -t kpatel20538/livestream-chat:chat . && sudo docker build --target dev -t kpatel20538/livestream-chat:chat-dev .
scripts.docker:push: sudo docker push kpatel20538/livestream-chat:chat && sudo docker push kpatel20538/livestream-chat:chat-dev
scripts.k8s:deploy: kubectl apply -f ../k8s/chat-service.yml --wait && kubectl rollout restart deployment chat
